events.text: I guess I have no choice but to settle in. Otherwise there’s no way I’ll get my hands on that trust fund.
I’ll just go to bed now.
( Man, I can’t believe mom’s making me attend this stupid school. )
( I didn’t even wanna go, but she paid so much money that they accepted me. )
( Eh, I’ll find a way to make it through. After I get this degree, I’ll have that money and it’s smooth sailing for me. )
One week passes…
Tomorrow is the first day of classes, I should sleep early…
…Is what I would say if I cared!
Whew, made it! I wonder-eep!
Huh? Whoa! Where did you come from? Who are you?
Uh…uhm…
…Heeey new roommate…?
Augh!
Sorry I’m late, thank god there was space here! I’m Marlon, nice to meet you!
No! NO! There’s no space! Can’t you see!?
I sure can see! There’s two beds! And look at this spacious floor plan! And I get a whole desk?!
No, no you don’t. There must be a mistake, this room is only meant for one person and that person is ME!
Get outta here!
Haha, you talk silly! Goodnight!
No, no, no! This is all wrong! Get out, get–
( …Is he… asleep? )
HE FELL ASLEEP!?
… *snore* …
( …I’m gonna kill him. )
( Although… it'll be much harder to get that trust fund if I break the law… Ugh, I’ll deal with this tomorrow. )
The next morning…
BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP!
BEEP BEEP BEEP!
… That…
BEEP BEEP BEEP!
… Doesn’t sound like my alarm…
BEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE–
–EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE–
–EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEP!
SHUT THE FUCK UP!!
BEE-oh, goody! You’re awake!
The whole school is awake! What’s your deal?
It’s the first day of school! As your trusty roommate and self-established friend, you can’t be late for class!
Ugh, class…?
Yes, class! You can’t miss it!
Uggggghhh, okay okay…sheesh! I’m up! I’M UP! STOP PULLING ME!
Okay, class starts in a minute, go get ‘em tiger.
A MINUTE! All that beeping with a minute to spare!?
Alright, I'll head to class, but you better be gone by the time I come back.
*lock click*
Okay he’s gone, I swear it’s in here somewhere…
Welcome to Biz 101, here’s a pop quiz.
What!? Right off the bat!?
( Huh…What…? )
( …Whaaaaat? )
( Man… there’s no way I passed that… )
( Ugh… )
( I guess I’ll head back to my dorm… )
You? Why are you still here!?
Hey, listen to me when I’m speaking!
Listen here you little sh–WOAH!
AAAIIIIIIIIIEEEEEEEEEEE!
WHY IS THE WORLD SPINNING!?
SOMEONE HELP ME! NOOOOOOW!!
Marlon? Who have you brought with you?
Mattie! I’m soooooorrryy!! I didn’t mean to, he jumped in when I wasn’t looking!
How can you let someone out-jump you!? How was he even able to enter?
*sniff* I don’t knoooooow! Mattie, don’t be mad at meeeeee… *sob*
*sigh* Marchie, I could never be mad at you, please. Cease this nonsense…
In any case, who are you?
…Who… huh? What? No, no, I should be the one asking questions!
Okay.
Huh?
Uh… Well… okay.
Where am I?
Who are you?
Who really are you?
Why are you a bunny?
HOW ARE YOU A BUNNY!?
I’m a HARE! *sob* Waaahh, Mattie, make him stoooop!
Now, now, it was just an honest mistake, March.
As for your questions, let’s see…
You are in Wonderland.
I am Matthew Hatcher.
March here really is Marlon Archie Hareld.
He is a hare, not a bunny.
As for the how, well, when two parents love each other very much–
Alright, alright, I get it.
What sort of harlequin-looking costume is this?
WHERE’S MY GUCCI!?
I suppose your clothes altered to match your new environment.
Environment? What do you mean by a new environment?
Ah…
Excuse us for a moment, uh… Sir…?
Worthington! Alistair Worthington!
Excuse us, Sir Worthington.
March, come here for a moment…
He’s not from our world. Has this happened before?
… Can we keep him?
Can we kee– *sigh*
I suppose it would be reckless to leave him alone and helpless.
Exactly!
Maybe he could help us with our predicament…
Oh yes, Mattie! I’ll take care of him!
Plus, he knows about that other world quite well!
Oh, does he now? That’s wonderful, Marchie.
Really!?
Yes, really. Let’s not leave him waiting now.
Ahem! Sir Worthington, a moment of your time, if you will?
Uh no, I want to get back to my room right now! Take me back!
Have you ever had a dream?
Excuse me?
Yeah! Desires? Wants? Wishes?
What he means is, wouldn’t you like to wish all your problems away?
…Huh?
Surely there’s something you’ve always wanted.
Always wanted…?
( All I want is an easygoing life where I don’t have to raise a single finger. And all of that is entirely possible if mom just let me have that stupid trust fund. )
Doesn’t everyone have something they’ve always wanted?
So that's a yes then, Alis?
Yes, wait–Alis? No, no, that’s Sir Worthington to you!
So that’s a yes then, Sir Alis?
I’ll rip your ears off, bunny.
Ahem. Well, what if you could have that with a flick of the wrist?
Well that’s impossible.
Maybe in your world, but here in Wonderland, the line between possible and impossible…
…tends to be a little fuzzy.
What are you trying to say? Speak normally for once!
That want… that desire that you were thinking about before… you could really have it here.
( I could…? )
…I’m listening.
We have the means to help you with that.
…Really? You want me to just believe you?
Of course not, we can give you a taste of our magic to convince you.
Yeah, tell us what you wish for!
( What a couple of nutjobs… )
( Although… there was that dumb quiz I took this morning… )
FINE, if I had to pick…
I just took a quiz at school this morning, and uh…
I-I’m pretty sure I missed half a point or something…
I wanna get that quiz back tomorrow with nothing less than a full score!
Ah, is that all?
Excuse me?
I will see that it is done.
Huh…?
March, do you have it ready?
Oh, of course, Mattie! Here you go, Alis!
Alistair: What… What is this?
A magical [b]cheat treat[/b]!
W-What should I do with it…?
Haha, what’s it say, silly?
( I’m not eating that. )
( Who knows where that's been? )
What’s wrong, Sir Worthington?
Don’t you want that full score?
I… ugh. Fine. Give it here.
( No way this is going to work. )
*crunch*
*nom nom*
( How can I purchase this? )
…Ahem… can I buy these perhaps?
Aww, you like my baking? Did you hear that, Mattie? He’s basically begging for more!
I AM NOT!
Okay, now what? When does this magic begin?
*chuckle* Oh, it’s already begun. You should return to your home and await the results of your…quiz.
Marlon, escort our friend back home.
Okay!
Wait, you’re telling me I could have gone back this whole time?
Hang on!
Wait! Wait–AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!
Ugh… I think I’m gonna be sick…
No time for that! You gotta make it to class tomorrow for your full score!
Time for bed! Let’s get you in there!
Put me down this instant!
Into bed you go!
Want me to tuck you in?
GOODNIGHT.
( What a strange day I had today. )
( Maybe I’ve been asleep the whole time… )
( Perhaps it was all a dream… )
The next morning...
BEEP BEEP BEE–
GODDAMN, IT WASN’T A DREAM!
BEEP–
I’M UP! I’M UP!!
Today’s the big day!
Huh?
Remember? You wanted to see if our magic could really help you!
( Oh, they were serious huh… )
Come on, come on! Chop chop!
Yeah, yeah. I hear you. Let’s head off.
Well… I’ve graded your pop quizzes from yesterday…
It was a pop quiz, I didn’t expect much from you anyway, but there was one student who got every question right!
( Look at all the nerds in this class, bet it was one of them… )
Alistair Worthington!
Alistair…? You are here, aren’t you?
( What…? From a cookie? )
Psst! Stop sitting there with your mouth open, go get your quiz!
U-Uh! Here, I’m here.
Very good, Alistair! Seems you’ve been working hard over summer!
Uh, yeah! Of course, who do you think I am? Heh…
( What? )
( What was that? )
( There’s no way I actually passed…Unless… )
Nope, there’s no way you passed.
So then… you were telling the truth?
Your magic is… it’s real then?
As real as your full score!
How interesting…
( So it really does work, then… )
( Hmm… Maybe their offer is worth listening to… )
Hey… Marlon.
Y-Yes, Alis!?
Take me back to your… What did you call it?
Oh, Wonderland! Yes! Yes, that’s lovely, come with me!
The only way is how we did it last time. Through mirrors!
( No no no no no! Oh god no, I almost threw up last time! )
( But those treats… I wonder what more I could do with them… )
( I’ll admit, this is a bit sketchy…but who would say no to an opportunity like this? )
Come on! Let’s get moving!
( Ugh… the mirror… )
Yes, I'm coming!
AAAAAUUUUUUUUUUUUHHHH!
Oh welcome back. What score did you receive?
How did you do it?
*chuckle* Just a bit of magic.
But that’s just a taste of what we could really achieve.
What do you mean?
Sir Worthington, do you know why you can visit Wonderland?
…Huh?
I’ve read many scriptures in my time here, and there is a tale that’s so old that it’s uncertain whether it is history or legend…
Long ago, there was a legendary sorceress of Wonderland who wanted to see beyond the dreams of her world.
She came across a beautiful music box with the power to grant her wishes to open the doors between realities.
However, when other sorcerers caught wind of her discovery, the music box was shattered as she played it, tearing the space between your world and Wonderland.
The pieces of the box were scattered across both worlds, and the power to substantiate wishes were lost forever.
Or so we thought!
Yes.
A while ago, during my time researching, I came across a piece of this music box in your world.
That’s why I had to come in and take it!
Yes, what you see here is the [b]outer box[/b] of that very music box.
W-Woah…
Does this mean… does this mean we can get our wishes too?
I see you are quick to grasp.
There are still more pieces to find, and there might be more in that school you came from.
Your knowledge of that world will be useful in finding all of these pieces.
Yeah! You look like you know how to get around. Especially with nice things like that fancy watch and your expensive belt!
( Oh… I guess I did work pretty hard begging mom to buy me the latest models. )
Precisely, and Marlon can help you retrieve the pieces in Wonderland.
So, I am going to offer you a proposal.
Join us in finding these pieces and all of our wishes will come true.
Don’t worry about running into troubles, because March and I will provide you with all the help you need.
( Any wish I want…  )
( My trust fund… I’ll see you soon, baby. )
Well, since you need me, I guess I can help find those pieces.
Yay! We’re coworkers now, Alis!
Yay!
( Hopefully this will be over soon… )
Not so fast, we have a ‘pop quiz’ for you as well.
What?
Yeah that’s right! The pieces won't just be lying around, you might have to work for it!
We’ve set up the test for you here, come see if you can solve it.
How wonderful! You did it!
Yes, I believe you are ready for the challenges that may come your way.
Of course I am!
You mentioned more pieces, Matthew. Where are those?
Ah, yes. I am glad you asked.
The next piece is the music box dancer, a little [b]Ballerina[/b]. I have located it within Wonderland.
Where in Wonderland?
Ah… My methods of divination can only take me so far.
Mattie reads the tea leaves for clues!
( Okay, so I’m working with a carnival fortune teller and a… bunny. )
Well, I don’t know anything about Wonderland. Where do I even start?
Oh, don’t you worry, I know my way around, I just need your help talking with the locals. I don’t wanna be seen by too many people.
What? Why’s that?
…There’s something I should tell you.
Wonderland is a lovely place, but its ruler is quite unforgiving.
Queen of Hearts rules over all the districts here, but has made it quite clear that I am no longer welcome in the kingdom.
Yeah, if Queen of Hearts turned Mattie away, there’s no telling what would happen to me!
( This queen must have a lot of influence over here. )
That’s fine. As long as you stick around and give me those magical treats, I’ll do the talking.
Wonderful, and that reminds me… Here is another [b]cheat treat[/b] as a reward. Use it if you feel the time calls for it.
Nice!!
It’s getting late now, I think you two should return to Alistair’s world to not draw suspicion. Why don’t you come search for the piece tomorrow?
I’ll read my tea leaves until you return.
Okay, Mattie! And Alis, take a look here!
Now that you’re with us, you can have this!
You can use this to freely travel between the worlds! It might be useful in our adventures!
Here, lemme show you how to use it now…
A–AAAAAAAAHHHHHHHH!!
( I don’t think I’ll ever get used to that… )
Come on, off to bed you go!
Stop, stop. I can take myself to bed this time.
Okay! Nighty-night!
You gotta say it back, we’re coworkers now!
Ugh…Goodnight.
